title: Tadej Pogačar and UAE Team Emirates Are Trying a New Method at Training Camp
content:
We take a closer look at the winter training programs of Tadej Pogačar and UAE Team Emirates. Like usual, there's a lot of Zone 2 — and something new.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar and UAE Team Emirates Are Trying a New Method at Training Camp on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
